name: menu-navigator
title: Menu Navigator
description: View and run menu bar item commands and keyboard shortcuts
author: bkimbriel

commands.name: show-commands
commands.title: Show Commands
commands.subtitle: Menu Navigator
commands.description: View and run menu bar item commands

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
